channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio Code ESLint extension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio Code ESLint extension

item.title: CVE-2020-1481|2024-08-04T06:39:09.682Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%20code%20eslint%20extension
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the ESLint extension for Visual Studio Code when it validates source code after opening a project, aka 'Visual Studio Code ESLint Extention Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.
